title: Subcommand blocks import throws execption
body:
### Description
When the Besu subcommand to import blocks is used instead of importing them successfully it throws an exception:

```
starting main client: /opt/besu/bin/besu --logging=INFO --genesis-file=/besugenesis.json --min-gas-price=16 --tx-pool-price-bump=0 --network-id=1337 --sync-mode=FAST --fast-sync-min-peers=1 --Xsynchronizer-fast-sync-pivot-distance=0 --host-whitelist=* --rpc-http-enabled --rpc-http-api=ETH,NET,WEB3,ADMIN --rpc-http-host=0.0.0.0 --rpc-ws-enabled --rpc-ws-api=ETH,NET,WEB3,ADMIN --rpc-ws-host=0.0.0.0 blocks import --run --skip-pow-validation-enabled /blocks/0001.rlp dummy


  | 2022-03-26 19:35:35.473+00:00 \| main \| INFO  \| BlocksSubCommand \| Import RLP block data from 2 files
  | 2022-03-26 19:35:36.132+00:00 \| main \| INFO  \| RocksDBKeyValueStorageFactory \| No existing database detected at /opt/besu. Using version 1
  | 2022-03-26 19:35:38.971+00:00 \| main \| INFO  \| KeyPairUtil \| Generated new secp256k1 public key 0x0ec891b21e8fbd316038fec162b7c11606e5693025acb29f3d1e7386a59fe79229c58d3f7f0c8c54dd4b5d8cc2332b9055defed207e664c848ec9d6b24644911 and stored it to /opt/besu/key
  | 2022-03-26 19:35:39.448+00:00 \| main \| INFO  \| ProtocolScheduleBuilder \| Protocol schedule created with milestones: [Istanbul: 0, London: 2000]
  | picocli.CommandLine$ExecutionException: Error while running command (org.hyperledger.besu.cli.subcommands.blocks.BlocksSubCommand$ImportSubCommand@67389cb8): picocli.CommandLine$InitializationException: Cannot instantiate org.hyperledger.besu.cli.util.VersionProvider: the class has no constructor
  | at picocli.CommandLine.executeUserObject(CommandLine.java:1948)
  | at picocli.CommandLine.access$1300(CommandLine.java:145)
  | at picocli.CommandLine$RunLast.executeUserObjectOfLastSubcommandWithSameParent(CommandLine.java:2358)
  | at picocli.CommandLine$RunLast.handle(CommandLine.java:2352)
  | at picocli.CommandLine$RunLast.handle(CommandLine.java:2314)
  | at picocli.CommandLine$AbstractParseResultHandler.handleParseResult(CommandLine.java:2172)
  | at picocli.CommandLine.parseWithHandlers(CommandLine.java:2559)
  | at org.hyperledger.besu.cli.util.ConfigOptionSearchAndRunHandler.handle(ConfigOptionSearchAndRunHandler.java:54)
  | at org.hyperledger.besu.cli.util.ConfigOptionSearchAndRunHandler.handle(ConfigOptionSearchAndRunHandler.java:31)
  | at picocli.CommandLine$AbstractParseResultHandler.handleParseResult(CommandLine.java:2172)
  | at picocli.CommandLine.parseWithHandlers(CommandLine.java:2559)
  | at org.hyperledger.besu.cli.BesuCommand.parse(BesuCommand.java:1518)
  | at org.hyperledger.besu.cli.BesuCommand.parse(BesuCommand.java:1327)
  | at org.hyperledger.besu.Besu.main(Besu.java:49)
  | Caused by: picocli.CommandLine$InitializationException: Cannot instantiate org.hyperledger.besu.cli.util.VersionProvider: the class has no constructor
  | at picocli.CommandLine$DefaultFactory.create(CommandLine.java:5543)
  | at picocli.CommandLine$DefaultFactory.createVersionProvider(CommandLine.java:5529)
  | at picocli.CommandLine$Model$CommandSpec.updateVersionProvider(CommandLine.java:7324)
  | at picocli.CommandLine$Model$CommandSpec.updateCommandAttributes(CommandLine.java:7290)
  | at picocli.CommandLine$Model$CommandReflection.extractCommandSpec(CommandLine.java:11496)
  | at picocli.CommandLine$Model$CommandSpec.forAnnotatedObject(CommandLine.java:6236)
  | at picocli.CommandLine.<init>(CommandLine.java:227)
  | at picocli.CommandLine.<init>(CommandLine.java:221)
  | at picocli.CommandLine.<init>(CommandLine.java:196)
  | at org.hyperledger.besu.cli.subcommands.blocks.BlocksSubCommand$ImportSubCommand.createController(BlocksSubCommand.java:256)
  | at org.hyperledger.besu.cli.subcommands.blocks.BlocksSubCommand$ImportSubCommand.run(BlocksSubCommand.java:203)
  | at picocli.CommandLine.executeUserObject(CommandLine.java:1939)
  | ... 13 more
  | Caused by: java.lang.NoSuchMethodException: org.hyperledger.besu.cli.util.VersionProvider.<init>()
  | at java.base/java.lang.Class.getConstructor0(Class.java:3349)
  | at java.base/java.lang.Class.getDeclaredConstructor(Class.java:2553)
  | at picocli.CommandLine$DefaultFactory.create(CommandLine.java:5514)
  | at picocli.CommandLine$DefaultFactory.create(CommandLine.java:5541)
  | ... 24 more
```

The error message above has been copied from here, which uses the Besu version from `main`: https://hivetests.ethdevops.io/viewer.html?file=results/besu/client-f1e7ae1736bffe41cc8b2f37e146584a16a2dfc1591b491b1b8091d60034ea71.log

It seems to be related to this PR #2762
